comment: If you can, avoid this professor. He is all over the place and created random grading scales on the spot. content is not hard and he does create a lot of opportunities to pass and get a really good grade, he is just very confusing. He doesnt really teach much unless you ask him to. 4 total tests, module quizzes,extra assignments and lab reports

the class was hard, he allows you retakes on the test. The material in the beginning was hard to understand and he was a little awkward at explaining it. The class became easier as the semester went on. I made it out with a solid B and I never missed a lab and only two classes. He is very caring and trust me he does not want you to fail. solid clas

This class is disproportionately harder than any other required course for ECE Majors. It is very math-intensive and there is a lot of memorization one must do. Still, Prof. Callahan allows re-takes of all the tests and is always willing to help if you don't understand a concept.  Really nice guy, and he wants you to do well, but it's a HARD class.

callahan is super caring and knowlegable. I would've liked his class a whole lot more if it wasnt at 8am twice a week and gave more "real life examples" of material we would go over in class. i appreciated his values on how retakes should completely replace the original grade because the same material is learned-just at a different time.

He's funny and dorky. Come to class unless you have a good bkground in science. I was struggling but he helped me w retakes and review. I could have gotten an A if I retook more. He really wants you to learn but you will have to work for it. would re-take again. beware, the less people who show up the more vague his questions will be on the test.

TAKE HIM! He is a very good professor and really wants his students to succeed. He gives chances to redo sections of the test that you missed or scored low on. He also makes himself available for his students if you need help. Take him! You won't regret it!
Dr. Callahan is a GREAT professor!! He really wants you to do well. Attendance isn't mandatory, but it's highly recommended. Re-takes on tests save your grade! TAKE HIM!!!

I LOVED Dr. Callahan. I am an early childhood education major and I learned from him effective ways of teaching and learning and about the science he taught. He is an amazing teacher and understands that LEARNING TAKES TIME. That being said, if you don't do well on the tests, he will let you retake them twice. Take this class!
He lets you re-take your tests. You never use the book. I never went to class and made a B! Labs are madatory as you have a lab quiz every week but he makes the labs fun and enjoyable! Take him!

I loved his class! He is extremely helpful and lets you retake exams. The final is an optional retake for whatever objectives you please. Attendance isn't mandatory, but you really should go and take the notes (keeps you from needing to read the book). He really should have amazing reviews.

Dr. Callahan is a really nice guy and a great teacher. This class is nowhere near easy. Show up to both class and lab or else you will not be happy. The tests are broken into different peices and you have a chance to reatake the ones you don't pass. STUDY USING THE PRACTICE TESTS. They are awesome. Dr. Callahan wants you to do well. You will learn!

you HAVE to go to class! tests are HARD but if you put in effort you can easily do well. he gives retakes, if you fail a portion of the test don't wait long to take the re-test, or you'll get behind. i'm having to take this class over  because i thought it would be a breeze... don't get behind! he's helpful and a good teacher. you really do learn

tests was very hard and not lined up w/book. majority of students had to do retakes which made it difficult to move forward. tests consists of essay while multiple choice was very difficult. Don't take this professor for class if you are not familiar with science as older student.
